trans-unit.source: A block-level flow content element used for grouping other <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 用來將其他 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> 項目分組的區塊層級非固定格式內容項目。

trans-unit.source: **Content Model:** <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> enforces a strong content model for child content.
trans-unit.target: **內容模型：** <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section>會強制執行強式的內容模型的子內容。

trans-unit.source: Child elements contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> element must be derived from <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Block>.
trans-unit.target: 中所包含的子項目<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section>元素必須衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Block>。

trans-unit.source: Valid child elements include:
trans-unit.target: 有效的子項目包括：

trans-unit.source: See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> object model.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[TextElement 內容模型概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md)如需有關<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section>物件模型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" /> 類別的新的空執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> object specifying the initial contents of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> 物件，用來指定新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" /> 的初始內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" /> class, taking a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> object as the initial contents of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" /> 類別的新執行個體，並將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> 物件做為新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" /> 的初始內容。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates usage of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範這個建構函式的使用方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection" /> containing the top-level <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> elements that comprise the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection" />，包含組成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> 內容的最上層 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection" /> containing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> elements that comprise the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" />
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection" />，包含組成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Block" /> 內容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection> returned by this property to enumerate or manipulate the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> element.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockCollection>列舉或操作的內容，這個屬性所傳回<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section>項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether or not a trailing paragraph break should be inserted after the last paragraph when placing the contents of a root <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" /> element on the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示在剪貼簿上放置根 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Section" /> 項目的內容時，結尾分段符號是否應插入最後段落的後面。

trans-unit.source: **true** to indicate that a trailing paragraph break should be included; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**表示尾端分段應該包含否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: This property is only applicable to the root <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> element within flow content.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只適用於根<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section>內非固定格式內容項目。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect on non-root <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section> elements contained within flow content.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性有任何影響非根<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Section>包含在非固定格式內容項目。

trans-unit.source: A serialization service manager object for this object.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件的序列化服務管理員物件。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，而且不能從程式碼直接使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Section.Blocks" /> property should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Section.Blocks" /> 屬性應進行序列化則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Raised when <paramref name="manager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="manager" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 時引發。
